title: Outside Plumbing: the Myths of Manhood
description: Men. Gotta love 'em. Really--how limited are our choices? Why is a guy a guy and why oh why do we let it annoy us so? Would you like to know how to get over that? Enjoy him for what he is? Don't get in such a pet over a couple of hours of Madden or WOW? Wonder why he didn't put his damn plate in the sink again? A little understanding goes a long way. I guarantee you will look at your guy in a new way. And I mean that as a positive. Of course. Also sure to give a boost to the ego of any guy who has ever felt just a little hen-pecked.Besides cultural, societal, and political pressures, there are documented reasons why men are different than women. Let's face it. Equal rights for all sounds politically correct, but sometimes, on a more personal front, it just doesn't work out that way.Said Waldo, "You discuss it without sounding like a bitch."
author: Virginia Llorca
